title: tri wear todo
summary: Focus on 3 things todo a day.  Simple, rewarding and focused.
description: There are a lot of task managers out there.  If you are frustrated by too many tasks in your regular todo app, the 'tri' app will focus you on what are the most important 3 tasks to accomplished every day.  Laser focus, GTD.Create and manage everything on the Android Wear device.  The phone app doesn't do anything other than explain how the app works on the watch.1) Only manage 3 things a day2) Tap to complete3) Tap again to replaceDesign by Instagram: @cate_not_kate
descriptionHTML:
There are a lot of task managers out there. If you are frustrated by too many tasks in your regular todo app, the 'tri' app will focus you on what are the most important 3 tasks to accomplished every day. Laser focus, GTD.

Create and manage everything on the Android Wear device. The phone app doesn't do anything other than explain how the app works on the watch.

1) Only manage 3 things a day
2) Tap to complete
3) Tap again to replace

Design by Instagram: @cate_not_kate
